cab.content: From Secretary of Slate to Viceroy, Foreiqn Department - 10th July 19j 7. ' - - . : . ' (Repeated to Resident, Aden.)' [P 2823] . Foreign Secret, Your telegram of 4th JuKv ' Hodeida Naval Coai- mander-in-Chief has been instructed not to bombard Hodeida again without' . consulting Admiralty.. -v. -. i
